## üìã Review Summary

This Pull Request introduces the foundational infrastructure and Kubernetes manifests for the backend application, focusing on secure CI/CD practices using Workload Identity Federation and Google Artifact Registry. The implementation aligns well with the stated design and proposal, setting up robust and scalable cloud provisioning.

## üîç General Feedback

- The refactoring of Pulumi components to pass `gcp.organizations.Project` objects instead of individual IDs significantly improves type safety and maintainability.
- The use of Kustomize overlays for environment-specific configurations is well-implemented and promotes flexibility.
- The detailed OpenSpec documentation (design, proposal, tasks, specs) provides excellent context and justification for the changes.
